member.name: MFFOLDDOWN_MATRIX
member.summary: Contains coefficients used to transform multichannel audio into a smaller number of audio channels. This process is called fold-down.

member.name: MFFOLDDOWN_MATRIX.cbSize
member.summary: Size of the structure, in bytes.

member.name: MFFOLDDOWN_MATRIX.dwChannelMask
member.summary: Specifies the assignment of audio channels to speaker positions in the transformed audio. This member is a bitwise OR of flags that define the speaker positions. For a list of valid flags, see MF_MT_AUDIO_CHANNEL_MASK attribute.

member.name: MFFOLDDOWN_MATRIX.Coeff
member.summary: Array that contains the fold-down coefficients. The number of coefficients is cSrcChannels×cDstChannels. If the number of coefficients is less than the size of the array, the remaining elements in the array are ignored. For more information about how the coefficients are applied, see Windows Media Audio Professional Codec Features.
